Character sheet will be generated here: Character sheet will be generated here
Enable or disable the character sheet ex: Enable or disable the character sheet extension
When enabled, this extension handles bot: When enabled, this extension handles both character sheet and memory updates, freezing the memory extension
Force update both character sheet and me: Force update both character sheet and memory
Edit generation prompt, insertion positi: Edit generation prompt, insertion position, etc.
Skip World Info and Author's Note scanni: Skip World Info and Author's Note scanning when generating the character sheet
Extension will build its own prompt usin: Extension will build its own prompt using messages that were not summarized yet. Blocks the chat until the update is generated
Extension will build its own prompt using messages that were not summarized yet. Does not block the chat while updating
Extension will use the regular main prom: Extension will use the regular main prompt builder
This prompt will be sent to AI to reques: This prompt will be sent to AI to request character sheet updates. {{words}} will resolve to the target length parameter
{{sheet}} will resolve to the character: {{sheet}} will resolve to the character sheet content
Include the latest character sheet in th: Include the latest character sheet in the WI scan
The character sheet will not be injected: The character sheet will not be injected into the prompt. You can still access it via the {{char_sheet}} macro
Remove the latest character sheet to try: Remove the latest character sheet to try again
No messages found to update from: No messages found to update from
Lock mode enabled. Memory extension will: Lock mode enabled. Memory extension will be frozen
Lock mode disabled. Memory extension can: Lock mode disabled. Memory extension can now update independently
Character sheet is active. Use /sheet up: Character sheet is active. Use /sheet update to force update
Character sheet is frozen. Use /sheet up: Character sheet is frozen. Use /sheet update to force update
Memory extension has been frozen. Charac: Memory extension has been frozen. Character Sheet extension will handle both updates
Memory extension has been unfrozen. It c: Memory extension has been unfrozen. It can now update independently
